name: Mah Jongg (Markt & Technik)
overview: A tile removing game published in 64'er 1993/01, and also in 64'er 1996/08. A game for relaxation, which guarantees you many hours on the breadbox and something for long winter evenings. Simply match the like tiles and make sure to allow the duplicate tiles pairs to allow later removal. After being removed, the game is ended when all pairs of tiles are removed.
